original_text:
Like keepers of a field are they against her all around,
    because she has rebelled against me,
declares the Lord.
korean_text: 그들이 밭을 지키는 자 같이 예루살렘을 에워싸나니 이는 그가 나를 거역했기 때문이니라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: Like keepers of a field are they against her all around,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 밭을 지키는 자들처럼 그녀를 사방에서 에워싸고 있으니,

sentences.original_text: because she has rebelled against me,
